items.title: Thailand and Cambodia thank Trump for mediation, but shelling continues
items.description: As he golfs in Scotland, the US president talks to the Thai and Cambodian leaders about a ceasefire.

items.title: Greece battles wildfires, evacuating residents near Athens
items.description: Residents just 30km away from Athens have fled their homes, as Greece's temperatures are forecast to reach 44C on Sunday.

items.title: The last custodian: A Kashmiri artisan's battle to save a musical legacy
items.description: Ghulam Mohammed Zaz fears for the future of the hand-made santoor as there are no takers for the dying artform.

items.title: Israel says it has dropped aid into Gaza
items.description: The IDF says seven packages with flour, sugar, and canned food were delivered to Gaza, amid a growing hunger crisis there.

items.title: Europe accused of going soft on Azerbaijan to avoid buying Russian gas
items.description: Critics say EU policy has given Azerbaijan's President Ilham Aliyev a free hand during his crackdown on opponents.
